{{Refimprove|date=January 2008}} {{Cleanup-laundry|date=March 2011}} This is a '''List of Old Haileyburians''', they being notable former students â known as "Old Haileyburians"<ref name=OHA>{{cite web |url=http://www.oha.org.au/index.php?id=2 |title=About OHA |accessdate=2008-01-21 |work=Old Haileyburians' Association |publisher=Haileybury}}</ref> of the school, [[Haileybury, Melbourne|Haileybury]] in [[Keysborough, Victoria|Keysborough]], [[Brighton, Victoria|Brighton]] and [[Berwick, Victoria|Berwick]], [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]], [[Australia]].
{{Expand list|date=February 2011}} <!-- Please do not add alumni without providing a source and/or link to a valid Wikipedia article --> <!-- Please add alumni in alphabetical order under appropriate category -->
==Academia== * [[Professor Rod Home]] â Senior Lecturer, Foundation Professor of History and Philosophy of Science at [[The University of Melbourne]] and Fellow of the Australian Academy of the Humanities, awarded the Academy Medal of The University of Melbourne * [[Dr Russel Kenley]] â Chair in Management at [[Swinburne University]] * [[Professor David Lowe]] â Professor of History * [[Doug Maromey]] â Chairman of Luther College University * [[Professor Jeff Borland]] â Professor of Economics at the [[University of Melbourne]] ==Business== * [[Bruce Akhurst]] â CEO of [[Sensis]]{{Disambiguation needed|date=June 2011}} * [[Simon Molesworth]] â Chairman of the Steering Committee, previously Chairman of the [[Australian Council of National Trusts]]
==Clergy== * [[Gregor Henderson]] â President of the [[Uniting Church in Australia]]
==Media, entertainment and the arts== * [[Jamie Blanks]] â Film Director * [[Kim Dalton]] â Head of [[ABC Television]] * [[Adam Elliot]] â [[Academy Award]] winning animation artist * [[John Carmichael]] â Noted composer and pianist * [[Richard Franklin (director)|Richard Franklin]] â [[Hollywood]] Director; ''[[Patrick (film)|Patrick]]'', ''[[Psycho II (film)|Psycho II]]'' and ''[[Roadgames]]'' *[[Ian Henderson (news presenter)|Ian Henderson]] â Anchorman for the [[Australian Broadcasting Corporation|ABC]] * [[William Franklyn]] â Renowned actor and voice artist * [[Jeremy Kewley]] â Actor * [[Theodore Penleigh]] â Painter * [[Ross Wilson (musician)|Ross Wilson]] â Rock musician
==Law== * [[Sir Wilfred Fullagar]] â Justice of the [[High Court of Australia]] and Knight of the British Empire * [[Lex Lasry]] â Judge of the [[Supreme Court of Victoria]] * [[Ross Sundberg]] â Judge of the [[Federal Court of Australia]]
==Military== * [[Rupert Downes]] â Major General of Medical Services in the Australian Army and world renowned Surgeon * [[Geoffrey Travers]] â Corporal in the Australian Army during World War 1 * [[James Sidney Swanton Vickery]] â Private in the Australian Army during World War 1 * [[Principal Air Chaplain Royce Thomas]] â Director General Chaplaincy Services Air Force * [[Jack Hazlitt]] â Renowned World War 1 Veteran * [[Mehmetahouly Albert Changarang]] â 8th Lieutenant-Officer in the Australian Royal Navy during World War 2 * [[George Webster Binnie]] â Lieutenant in the Australian Army during World War 1 and Director of Websters Limited, Sydney * [[Charles Henry Langtree]] â Lieutenant in the Australian Army during World War 1 and AFL Footballer, Collingwood * [[Hagan Fuller]] â World War 2 Veteran
==Politics== * [[Tim Holding]] â former Minister for Manufacturing and Export, Minister for Financial Services Industry, Minister for Police & Emergency Services, Minister for Corrections, Minister for Tourism and Minister for Information and Communication Technology and Finance Minister in Victoria's State parliament * [[Alan Tudge]] â Federal MP for Aston * [[Nick Wakeling]] â Victorian MLA for Ferntree Gully
==Science and Medicine== * [[Sir Hibbert Alan S. Newton]] â Foundation fellow and President of the [[Royal Australasian College of Surgeons]] and Chairman of the Medical Equipment Control Committee * [[Dr. Leon Garner]] â made Office of the New Zealand Order of Merit for services to Optometry * [[Dr. Douglas Travis]] â President of the [[Australian Medical Association]], Victoria
==Sport== * [[Stewart Loewe]] â [[Australian Football League|AFL]] footballer, [[St Kilda Football Club|St Kilda]] * [[Sam Sheldon]] â AFL footballer, [[Brisbane Lions]] * [[Brett Voss]] â AFL footballer, [[St Kilda Football Club|St Kilda]] * [[Stefan Martin]] â AFL footballer, [[Melbourne Football Club|Melbourne]] * [[Ben Drysdale]] â National 100 and 200 metre swimming champion * [[Brett Collins]] â AFL footballer, [[Hawthorn Football Club|Hawthorn]] * [[Tony Brown (Australian rules footballer)|Tony Brown]] â AFL footballer, [[St Kilda Football Club|St Kilda]] * [[Steven O'Dor]] â Young [[Socceroos]] and [[Wellington Phoenix]] soccer player * [[Brett Moyle]] â AFL footballer, [[St Kilda Football Club|St Kilda]] * [[Shane Valenti]] â AFL footballer, [[Melbourne Football Club]] * [[James Thiessen]] â AFL footballer, [[Adelaide Crows]] * [[Dylan Smith (Australian rules footballer)|Dylan Smith]] â AFL footballer, [[Fremantle Football Club|Fremantle]] & [[North Melbourne Football Club]] * [[Gerry Hazlitt]] â Test cricketer for [[Australia national cricket team|Australia]] * [[Robert Rose (sportsman)|Robert Rose]] â Footballer, [[Collingwood Football Club]] & [[Footscray Football Club]], Cricketer for [[Victoria cricket team|Victoria]] * [[Jarred Moore]] â AFL footballer, [[Sydney Swans]] * [[Tom Lynch (Australian footballer, born 1990)|Tom Lynch]] â [[Australian Football League|AFL]] footballer, [[St Kilda Football Club|St Kilda]] * [[Tyrone Vickery]] â AFL footballer, [[Richmond Football Club|Richmond]] * [[Ashley Smith]] â AFL footballer, [[West Coast Eagles]] * [[Tom Scully]] â AFL footballer, [[Melbourne Football Club|Melbourne]] * [[Alex Silvagni]] â AFL footballer, [[Fremantle Football Club]] * [[Jack Hutchins]] â AFL footballer, [[Gold Coast Football Club]] * [[Jack Gunston]] â AFL footballer, [[Adelaide Football Club]] & [[Hawthorn Football Club]]
==Other== * [[Russel Mathews]] â Foundation member and President of the [[Accounting Association of Australia and New Zealand]] * [[Peter Barrie Smith]] â Awarded Medal of the [[Order of Australia]] for contribution to Horticulture * [[Jack McConnell]] â Pioneering Architect, awarded the [[RAIA Gold Medal]] and member or the [[Order of Australia]] * [[Bashir Ebrahim]]- Awarded Medal of the [[Order of Australia]] for 22 years of service to the nationâs blind and vision impaired community
